card.name: AEther Searcher
card.text: Reveal AEther Searcher as you draft it. Reveal the next card you draft and note its name. When AEther Searcher enters the battlefield, you may search your hand and/or library for a card with a name noted as you drafted cards named AEther Searcher. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you searched your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: AEther Tradewinds
card.text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

card.name: Academy Elite
card.text: Academy Elite enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in all graveyards. {2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Academy Elite: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Agent of Acquisitions
card.text: Draft Agent of Acquisitions face up. Instead of drafting a card from a booster pack, you may draft each card in that booster pack, one at a time. If you do, turn Agent of Acquisitions face down and you can't draft cards for the rest of this draft round.

card.name: Air Servant
card.text: Flying {2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.

card.name: Altar of Dementia
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Target player puts a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Altar's Reap
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

card.name: Apex Hawks
Assassinate
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Barbed Shocker
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever Barbed Shocker deals damage to a player, that player discards all the cards in his or her hand, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Basandra, Battle Seraph
card.text: Flying Players can't cast spells during combat. {R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Bite of the Black Rose
card.text: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for sickness or psychosis. If sickness gets more votes, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. If psychosis gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent discards two cards.

card.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
card.text: Cowards can't block Warriors. {R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn. {2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

card.name: Brago's Representative
card.text: While voting, you get an additional vote.

card.name: Brago, King Eternal
card.text: Flying Whenever Brago, King Eternal deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

card.name: Brainstorm
card.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Breakthrough
card.text: Draw four cards, then choose X cards in your hand and discard the rest.

card.name: Brimstone Volley
card.text: Brimstone Volley deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Morbid - Brimstone Volley deals 5 damage to that creature or player instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Canal Dredger
card.text: Draft Canal Dredger face up. Each player passes the last card from each booster pack to a player who drafted a card named Canal Dredger. {T}: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Charging Rhino
card.text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Chartooth Cougar
card.text: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2}

card.name: Cinder Wall
card.text: Defender When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

card.name: Coercive Portal
card.text: Will of the council - At the beginning of your upkeep, starting with you, each player votes for carnage or homage. If carnage gets more votes, sacrifice Coercive Portal and destroy all nonland permanents. If homage gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw a card.

card.name: Cogwork Grinder
card.text: Draft Cogwork Grinder face up. As you draft a card, you may remove it from the draft face down. Cogwork Grinder enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards you removed from the draft with cards named Cogwork Grinder.

card.name: Cogwork Librarian
card.text: Draft Cogwork Librarian face up. As you draft a card, you may draft an additional card from that booster pack. If you do, put Cogwork Librarian into that booster pack.

card.name: Cogwork Spy
card.text: Reveal Cogwork Spy as you draft it. You may look at the next card drafted from this booster pack. Flying

card.name: Cogwork Tracker
card.text: Reveal Cogwork Tracker as you draft it and note the player who passed it to you. Cogwork Tracker attacks each turn if able. Cogwork Tracker attacks a player you noted for cards named Cogwork Tracker each turn if able.

card.name: Compulsive Research
card.text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless he or she discards a land card.

card.name: Copperhorn Scout
card.text: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.

card.name: Council Guardian
card.text: Will of the council - When Council Guardian enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for blue, black, red, or green. Council Guardian gains protection from each color with the most votes or tied for most votes.

card.name: Council's Judgment
card.text: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.

card.name: Courier Hawk
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Crookclaw Transmuter
card.text: Flash Flying When Crookclaw Transmuter enters the battlefield, switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Custodi Soulbinders
card.text: Custodi Soulbinders enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Custodi Soulbinders: Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Custodi Squire
card.text: Flying Will of the council - When Custodi Squire enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.

card.name: Dack Fayden
card.text: +1: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards. -2: Gain control of target artifact. -6: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents."

card.name: Dack's Duplicate
card.text: You may have Dack's Duplicate enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield except it gains haste and dethrone.

card.name: Deal Broker
card.text: Draft Deal Broker face up. Immediately after the draft, you may reveal a card in your card pool. Each other player may offer you one card in his or her card pool in exchange. You may accept any one offer. {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Deathforge Shaman
card.text: Multikicker {R} When Deathforge Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to twice the number of times it was kicked.

card.name: Deathreap Ritual
card.text: Morbid - At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, you may draw a card.

card.name: Deathrender
Decimate
card.text: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land.

card.name: Dimir Doppelganger
card.text: {1}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Dimir Doppelganger becomes a copy of that card and gains this ability.

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.text: When Doomed Traveler dies, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Drakestown Forgotten
card.text: Drakestown Forgotten enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards. {2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Drakestown Forgotten: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Dream Fracture
card.text: Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card. Draw a card.

card.name: Echoing Courage
card.text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Edric, Spymaster of Trest
card.text: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may draw a card.

card.name: Elephant Guide
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature dies, put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Elvish Aberration
card.text: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Forestcycling {2}

card.name: Enclave Elite
Exploration
card.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

card.name: Explorer's Scope
card.text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. Equip {1}

card.name: Extract from Darkness
card.text: Each player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Then put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Fact or Fiction
card.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Favorable Winds
card.text: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

card.name: Fires of Yavimaya
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Fireshrieker
card.text: Equipped creature has double strike. Equip {2}

card.name: Flamewright
card.text: {1}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token with defender onto the battlefield. {T}, Sacrifice a creature with defender: Flamewright deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Flaring Flame-Kin
card.text: As long as Flaring Flame-Kin is enchanted, it gets +2/+2, has trample, and has "{R}: Flaring Flame-Kin gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Flowstone Blade
card.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Galvanic Juggernaut
card.text: Galvanic Juggernaut attacks each turn if able. Galvanic Juggernaut doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever another creature dies, untap Galvanic Juggernaut.

card.name: Gamekeeper
card.text: When Gamekeeper dies, you may exile it. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Glimmerpoint Stag
card.text: Vigilance When Glimmerpoint Stag enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Gnarlid Pack
card.text: Multikicker {1}{G} Gnarlid Pack enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Grenzo's Cutthroat
card.text: First strike Dethrone

card.name: Grenzo's Rebuttal
card.text: Put a 4/4 red Ogre creature token onto the battlefield. Starting with you, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, and a land from among the permanents controlled by the player to his or her left. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.

card.name: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden
card.text: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {2}: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Grixis Illusionist
card.text: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Grudge Keeper
card.text: Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you didn't vote for loses 2 life.

card.name: Guardian Zendikon
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 2/6 white Wall creature with defender. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Heartless Hidetsugu
card.text: {T}: Heartless Hidetsugu deals damage to each player equal to half that player's life total, rounded down.

card.name: Heckling Fiends
card.text: {2}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Howling Wolf
card.text: When Howling Wolf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Howling Wolf, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Hunger of the Howlpack
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Morbid - Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Hydra Omnivore
card.text: Whenever Hydra Omnivore deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to each other opponent.

card.name: Ignition Team
card.text: Ignition Team enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of tapped lands on the battlefield. {2}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ignition Team: Target land becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Ill-Gotten Gains
card.text: Exile Ill-Gotten Gains. Each player discards his or her hand, then returns up to three cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.

card.name: Infectious Horror
card.text: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Intangible Virtue
card.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

card.name: Jetting Glasskite
card.text: Flying Whenever Jetting Glasskite becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time in a turn, counter that spell or ability.

card.name: Kor Chant
card.text: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.

card.name: Lead the Stampede
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Liliana's Specter
card.text: Flying When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Lore Seeker
card.text: Reveal Lore Seeker as you draft it. After you draft Lore Seeker, you may add a booster pack to the draft.

card.name: Lurking Automaton
card.text: Reveal Lurking Automaton as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including Lurking Automaton. Lurking Automaton enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the highest number you noted for cards named Lurking Automaton.

card.name: Magister of Worth
card.text: Flying Will of the council - When Magister of Worth enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from his or her graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than Magister of Worth.

card.name: Magus of the Mirror
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mirror: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Mana Geyser
card.text: Add {R} to your mana pool for each tapped land your opponents control.

card.name: Marchesa's Infiltrator
card.text: Dethrone Whenever Marchesa's Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Marchesa's Smuggler
card.text: Dethrone {1}{U}{R}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Marchesa, the Black Rose
card.text: Dethrone Other creatures you control have dethrone. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Minamo Scrollkeeper
card.text: Defender Your maximum hand size is increased by one.

card.name: Mirari's Wake
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.

card.name: Mirrodin's Core
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Put a charge counter on Mirrodin's Core. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Mirrodin's Core: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Misdirection
card.text: You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay Misdirection's mana cost. Change the target of target spell with a single target.

card.name: Moment of Heroism
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Morkrut Banshee
card.text: Morbid - When Morkrut Banshee enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Mortify
card.text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.

card.name: Muzzio, Visionary Architect
card.text: {3}{U}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the highest converted mana cost among artifacts you control. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Nature's Claim
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

card.name: Necromantic Thirst
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Noble Templar
card.text: Vigilance Plainscycling {2}

card.name: Orcish Cannonade
card.text: Orcish Cannonade deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you. Draw a card.

card.name: Paliano, the High City
card.text: Reveal Paliano, the High City as you draft it. The player to your right chooses a color, you choose another color, then the player to your left chooses a third color. {T}: Add one mana to your mana pool of any color chosen as you drafted cards named Paliano, the High City.

card.name: Peace Strider
card.text: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Pelakka Wurm
card.text: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

card.name: Pernicious Deed
card.text: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.

card.name: Phage the Untouchable
card.text: When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game. Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated. Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

card.name: Pitchburn Devils
card.text: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Plagued Rusalka
card.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Plea for Power
card.text: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for time or knowledge. If time gets more votes, take an extra turn after this one. If knowledge gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw three cards.

card.name: Plummet
card.text: Destroy target creature with flying.

card.name: Power of Fire
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Predator's Howl
card.text: Put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. Morbid - Put three 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens onto the battlefield instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Pride Guardian
card.text: Defender Whenever Pride Guardian blocks, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Pristine Angel
card.text: Flying As long as Pristine Angel is untapped, it has protection from artifacts and from all colors. Whenever you cast a spell, you may untap Pristine Angel.

card.name: Provoke
card.text: Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able. Draw a card.

card.name: Quag Vampires
Quicksand
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Realm Seekers
card.text: Realm Seekers enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total number of cards in all players' hands. {2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Realm Seekers: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Reckless Scholar
card.text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

card.name: Reckless Spite
card.text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

card.name: Reflecting Pool
card.text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.

card.name: Reign of the Pit
card.text: Each player sacrifices a creature. Put an X/X black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way.

card.name: Reito Lantern
card.text: {3}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Relic Crush
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Respite
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

card.name: Reya Dawnbringer
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Rousing of Souls
card.text: Parley - Each player reveals the top card of his or her library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Then each player draws a card.

card.name: Rout
card.text: You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Runed Servitor
card.text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

card.name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
card.text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Scourge of the Throne
card.text: Flying Dethrone Whenever Scourge of the Throne attacks for the first time each turn, if it's attacking the player with the most life or tied for most life, untap all attacking creatures. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Screaming Seahawk
card.text: Flying When Screaming Seahawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Screaming Seahawk, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Selvala's Charge
card.text: Parley - Each player reveals the top card of his or her library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield. Then each player draws a card.

card.name: Selvala's Enforcer
card.text: Parley - When Selvala's Enforcer enters the battlefield, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. For each nonland card revealed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Selvala's Enforcer. Then each player draws a card.

card.name: Selvala, Explorer Returned
card.text: Parley - {T}: Each player reveals the top card of his or her library. For each nonland card revealed this way, add {G} to your mana pool and you gain 1 life. Then each player draws a card.

card.text: Flying Islandcycling {2}

card.name: Silent Arbiter
card.text: No more than one creature can attack each combat. No more than one creature can block each combat.

card.name: Spectral Searchlight
card.text: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color he or she chooses to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Spiritmonger
card.text: Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger. {B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger. {G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Split Decision
card.text: Will of the council - Choose target instant or sorcery spell. Starting with you, each player votes for denial or duplication. If denial gets more votes, counter the spell. If duplication gets more votes or the vote is tied, copy the spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Spontaneous Combustion
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Spontaneous Combustion, sacrifice a creature. Spontaneous Combustion deals 3 damage to each creature.

card.name: Squirrel Nest
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Put a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token onto the battlefield."

card.name: Stasis Cell
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.

card.name: Stave Off
card.text: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Stifle
card.text: Counter target activated or triggered ability.

card.name: Stronghold Discipline
card.text: Each player loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls.

card.name: Sulfuric Vortex
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player. If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Syphon Soul
card.text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

card.name: Terastodon
card.text: When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller puts a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Torch Fiend
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice Torch Fiend: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Tragic Slip
card.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Morbid - That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Traveler's Cloak

card.name: Treasonous Ogre
card.text: Dethrone Pay 3 life: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Turn the Tide
card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Twisted Abomination
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. Swampcycling {2}

card.name: Tyrant's Choice
card.text: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for death or torture. If death gets more votes, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If torture gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent loses 4 life.

card.name: Uncontrollable Anger
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Unhallowed Pact
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Unquestioned Authority
card.text: Enchant creature When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.

card.name: Valor Made Real
card.text: Target creature can block any number of creatures this turn.

card.name: Vampire Hexmage
card.text: First strike Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

card.name: Vedalken Orrery
card.text: You may cast nonland cards as though they had flash.

card.name: Vent Sentinel
card.text: Defender {1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player equal to the number of creatures with defender you control.

card.name: Victimize
card.text: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Volcanic Fallout
card.text: Volcanic Fallout can't be countered. Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Vow of Duty
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or a planeswalker you control.

card.name: Wakedancer
card.text: Morbid - When Wakedancer enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Wakestone Gargoyle
card.text: Defender, flying {1}{W}: Creatures you control with defender can attack this turn as though they didn't have defender.

card.name: Warmonger's Chariot
Whispergear Sneak
card.text: Draft Whispergear Sneak face up. During the draft, you may turn Whispergear Sneak face down. If you do, look at any unopened booster pack in the draft or any booster pack not being looked at by another player.

card.name: Wind Dancer
card.text: Flying {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Wolfbriar Elemental
card.text: Multikicker {G} When Wolfbriar Elemental enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Wood Sage
card.text: {T}: Name a creature card. Reveal the top four cards of your library and put all of them with that name into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Woodvine Elemental
card.text: Trample Parley - Whenever Woodvine Elemental attacks, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. For each nonland card revealed this way, attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Then each player draws a card.

card.name: Wrap in Flames
card.text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Wrap in Vigor
card.text: Regenerate each creature you control.
